about_the_game:
Jonathan, a mentally ill man, becomes increasingly addicted to medication without realizing it. One day, his family disappears, and strange events unfold in the house. He escapes into a delusion caused by the medication to avoid the reality of their deaths... Faced with shocking truths amidst repeated fear and confusion.

Can't revert is a thrilling horror game set in a house with a sinister atmosphere.

Vivid and Thrilling Horror

Experience realistic graphics and minimal user interface, making you feel as if you're truly inside the game.



Realistic Graphics: High-resolution graphics powered by Unreal Engine allow you to experience every detail vividly.
Minimal User Interface: A simplified UI enhances immersion, letting you focus on the game without distractions.

Loop

Overcome psychological pressure and fear in a constantly repeating space and escape the house. The truth of the house is revealed through the evolving story and secrets.

Repeating Space: Find hidden secrets and clues in ever-changing environments to escape.
Psychological Horror: Face growing psychological pressure and fear in the repeating loop.

Puzzles

Solve various puzzles to escape the house that seeks to trap you. Each puzzle brings new clues, leading you deeper into hidden secrets.

Exploration

Explore the eerie corridors and dark rooms, uncovering hidden secrets throughout the house. Find clues, solve puzzles, and survive in a tense atmosphere.

Hidden Secrets

Discover clues that connect the past and present and uncover a deeper story.

Are you ready to escape the sinister house hiding shocking truths?

name: Can't revert Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Can't revert is a first-person psychological horror game. You repeatedly find yourself in a house where your wife and son are dead. Discover hidden clues in the house and uncover the secrets of their deaths. Experience the constant tension and fear in the repetitive space.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
